Name: Nigel Catsburg
Content:
Why hello there valued intern, I'm Nigel Catsburg, Vice Co-Head of Junior Executive (and the boss's nephew).
Say, I could really use your help, apparently someone has to take the blame for a little incident that happened in South America involving some of our very safe products being used as munitions by insurgents, and I just dont have the heart to do it myself, can you choose who we'll fire over this?
